name: The Kingdom of XYZ!
description:
A lone smiley face looking for a relaxing vacation...

A kingdom full of secrets...

Puns. Lots of puns.

...did that tree just speak? Yes. Yes it did.

The Kingdom of XYZ is a silly adventure game made by one dude who likes too many video games. Solve puzzles, shoot the enemies, swim with jellyfish, also swim up a river, and follow a maze. Fun stuff all around!

Keyboard only. PC only. Fox only. Final Destination. No items.

Minimum specs: somewhere between a Commodore 64 and Windows 3.1.

Follow me over on twitter- @frank0127

I hope you enjoy! :)
